definition: main mountain of a region
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The Yiwulu Mountain in Jinzhou has been well-known since ancient times as one of China's five regional mountains.
sentences.chinese: 锦州的医巫闾山历史悠久，是中国五大镇山之一。
